name: LocketOccupancy
0:
”Alexa activate locket”
”Alexa, open activate locket”
”Alexa open activate locket”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: activate locket
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Skill allows you to play different types of sounds depending on task selected.

In order to use this skill you need to link it to your Locket account, there you can configure sounds played by each of the tasks.

Tasks consist of: Speaker Only task, Indoor Motion task and Outdoor Motion task. Each of them represents different trigger type, if you want to differentiate sound depending on trigger, you can configure it directly in the Locket application.
